p: One-way ANOVA analyses were conducted do detect differences between groups. For further analysis, the conservative Bonferroni post-hoc test was used to detect differences between mean values. This test was selected because it allows to compare large numbers of groups without erroneous results of hypothesis testing. Differences were considered significant at P < 0.05. To estimate influence of the studied factors, two-way ANOVA and three-way ANOVA were used for analysis among each species and for analysis of all species together, respectively. All analyses were conducted using StatisticaTM v. 13.3 (Tibco Software Inc.).
